text: Several political parties operate in Trentino-Alto Adige/Südtirol, and historically they have been even more than today. The Region is composed of two autonomous provinces, having two different system of parties: Trentino and South Tyrol. No one party has ever had the chance of gaining power alone (even if the Daisy Civic List and the South Tyrolean People's Party are by far the largest parties their Province) and thus parties must work with each other to form coalition governments. ==Trentino== ==South Tyrol== ==See also== *List of political parties in Italy Category:Politics of Trentino-Alto Adige/Südtirol Trentino-Alto Adige Sudtirol de:Parteien Südtirols
title: List of political parties in Trentino-Alto Adige/Südtirol
